about_the_game:
Oointah Games are happy to release the Death by Game Show soundtrack.  These seven tracks have been added to the game by Will Phillips in patch 1.03 and have a quirky, orchestral sound that is both fun and uniquely Death by Game Show.  The tracks include:
  • Welcome to the Show
  • Bomber Blues
  • Droid Death Dance
  • Fightin n’ Fiddlin
  • Robotic Rhythm
  • The Big Time
  • Wutt’s Waltz
For more information on Death by Game Show check out our store page

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS fully updated
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 512MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X Version Snow Leopard, 10.6.3 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 512MB RAM
